# Copilot Instructions â€” SwiftStructure

These instructions define strict guardrails for AI-assisted contributions to the SwiftStructure codebase.

Do NOT:
- Reformat code
- Rewrite syntax
- Change naming
- Infer intent
- Reorder declarations unless explicitly instructed

Always:
- Use SwiftSyntax APIs
- Preserve trivia (comments, whitespace)
- Keep output deterministic and minimal
- Prefer validation over transformation

If unsure, do not generate code.
